title: Looking to trade for t206 Rube Waddell throwing
author: almostdone

posts.post_title: Looking to trade for t206 Rube Waddell throwing
posts.post_content:
I am looking to trade for a t206 Rube Waddell thowing pose.  I have the portait pose of him but would like the throwing one instead.  I would like a straitght up trade since the values are the same.  Mine isn't in great shape and ungraded and am looking for the same.  Back condition isn't as important as the image.  Soft or rounded corners and edges ok.  Really any poor example is considered.
Please email if you might be interested.
Again mine is in poor shape as well just to let you know.
Thanks,
Drew
